DOC.brief_summary: This study examine safety , tolerability , efficacy mirabegron ( YM178 ) compare placebo .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Mirabegron ( YM178 ) Men With Lower Urinary Tract Symptoms ( LUTS ) Bladder Outlet Obstruction ( BOO )
DOC.criteria: Men 45 year age older Documented bladder outlet obstruction History urinary retention Symptomatic recurrent urinary tract infection ( UTI )
